name: Alone, Not Lonely
description:
Alone, Not Lonely is a mixed 2D and 3D, First Person, Puzzle and Adventure RPG taking place in the Louisiana Bayou.

Play as Gabriel, a 7 year old child, who wakes up to an empty house in the middle of the night; that becomes not so empty once a mysterious figure was discovered in the attic. With your goal being to follow after this new-found figure through a maze of your own home and imaginary fears, you will be working towards finding out the figure's true identity. While also trying  to escape your overwhelming feelings of loneliness and anxiety.

- Feel free to test our game throughout its production phases -

Experiencing issues? We'd love more info: https://forms.gle/FUsGtJcorTQbZYWW8

This game is being made as part of UCSC's Art and Design: Games and Playable Media and Computer Science: Game Design Capstone Series
